member.name: M:NLog.Mongo.ExceptionHelper.MustBeRethrown(System.Exception)
member.summary:
Determines whether the exception must be rethrown and logs the error to the if is false.
Advised to log first the error to the before calling this method.
member.returns: trueif the must be rethrown, false otherwise.

member.name: M:NLog.Mongo.ExceptionHelper.MustBeRethrownImmediately(System.Exception)
member.summary:
Determines whether the exception must be rethrown immediately, without logging the error to the .
Only used this method in special cases.
member.returns: trueif the must be rethrown, false otherwise.

member.name: M:NLog.Mongo.MongoTarget.Write(System.Collections.Generic.IList{NLog.Common.AsyncLogEventInfo})
member.summary: Writes an array of logging events to the log target. By default it iterates on all events and passes them to "Write" method. Inheriting classes can use this method to optimize batch writes.
member.param: Logging events to be written out.

member.param: Logging event to be written out.
